fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
APRN is engaged with the EU PFD. It also signed an EU Framework Partnership Agreement last March 2016. 
 
It is co-applicant of the CSO Partnership for Development Effectiveness.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Asia Pacific Regional CSO Engagement Mechanism-www.asiapacificrcem.org/‎ 
 
CSO Partnership for Development Effectiveness-csopartnership.org/‎ 
 
Our World is Not for Sale-www.ourworldisnotforsale.org
goals__remit:
Vision 
An Asia Pacific region, where social justice and people’s democracy are upheld, wherein 
people enjoy their human rights and genuine sustainable development. 
 
Mission 
To empower communities and peoples movements to face globalization and claim their 
rights through building their capacities on people’s research, education and information, 
advocacy, and development effectiveness.
